JointDistance - Class in com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint
A distance joint, makes length between bodies constant.
JointDistance(World, Body, Body, float, float, float, float, boolean) - Constructor for class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint.JointDistance
A more customized variant of a distance joint.
JointDistance(World, Body, Body, float, boolean) - Constructor for class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint.JointDistance
Creates a distance joint by providing just the length instead of the specific coordinates.

A more customized variant of a distance joint, takes in the wrapped physics bodies instead of the LibGDX defaults.

Creates a distance joint by providing just the length instead of the specific coordinates, takes in the wrapped physics bodies instead of the LibGDX defaults.

JointGear - Class in com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint
Gear Joint, is used to connect two joints together.
JointGear(World, Body, Body, RevoluteJoint, PrismaticJoint, float, boolean) - Constructor for class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint.JointGear
Creates a gear joint, you specify a gear ratio to bind the motions together: coordinate1 + ratio * coordinate2 = constant The ratio can be negative or positive.
JointGear(World, PhysicsBody2D, PhysicsBody2D, JointRevolute, JointPrismatic, float, boolean) - Constructor for class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint.JointGear
Creates a gear joint, you specify a gear ratio to bind the motions together: coordinate1 + ratio * coordinate2 = constant The ratio can be negative or positive.

JointWheel - Class in com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint
